Description:
Zscaler (NASDAQ: ZS) accelerates digital transformation so that customers can be more agile, efficient, resilient, and secure. The Zscaler Zero Trust Exchange is the company’s cloud-native platform that protects thousands of customers from cyberattacks and data loss by securely connecting users, devices, and applications in any location. With more than 10 years of experience developing, operating, and scaling the cloud, Zscaler serves thousands of enterprise customers around the world, including 450 of the Forbes Global 2000 organizations. In addition to protecting customers from damaging threats, such as ransomware and data exfiltration, it helps them slash costs, reduce complexity, and improve the user experience by eliminating stacks of latency-creating gateway appliances. Zscaler was founded in 2007 with a mission to make the cloud a safe place to do business and a more enjoyable experience for enterprise users. Zscaler’s purpose-built security platform puts a company’s defenses and controls where the connections occur—the internet—so that every connection is fast and secure, no matter how or where users connect or where their applications and workloads reside.Position: Senior Business Systems Analyst- ServiceNow
Location: Bangalore / HyderabadThis position is responsible to create and deliver value by automating business processes and supporting our ServiceNow application to support business growth. The main responsibility of this position is to partner directly with our IT Operations teams to implement major projects and enhancements related to IT Asset Management and ITSM processes.  You will be part of the IT Business Applications team and engage and collaborate with IT Ops team.Responsibilities/What You’ll Do:Meet with business leaders, decision-makers, and end-users to define business requirements, and systems goals
Facilitate discussions among business owners to understand problem statements and gather requirements
Have a strategic advisor mindset to assist business stakeholders with accomplishing their business outcomes
Lead, own, and deliver the ServiceNow application related projects within the defined timelines using the Agile/Scrum methodology
Automate new business processes and improve the existing ones 
Interact with cross-functional business units to define requirements and understand the system's upstream and downstream changes
Document and develop high level, business processes flow, requirements, and design documents for new business requirements 
Manage implementation vendors and consultants to implement new systems, projects, and enhancements 
Engage with business partners to discuss business requirements, determine feasibility, business value, and a cost-effective and scalable solution
Stay up to date with ServiceNow's latest releases and review new useful features and functionalities with our business team
Ability to effectively collaborate with the business stakeholders
Identify test criteria and test new functionality/enhancements
Provide training to end-usersMinimum of 6 years of IT experience in complete software development life cycle process including System Analysis, Design, Development, Testing, Implementation, and Documentation
Minimum of 4 yr. experience as a business analyst for an enterprise ITIL/ITSM platform
Minimum of 3 yr. experience with the ServiceNow platform
ITIL certification is a major plus
Strong knowledge of Change Management, Configuration Management, and Release Management as it relates to ITIL
Strong knowledge of ITSM, ITOM, IT Asset Management, Sec Ops, Dev Ops CMDB, and ITSM processes
Implementation experience for SecOps (SIR, VR, Threat Intelligence)
Hands-on experience with ServiceNow Platform capabilities and configuration
Strong knowledge of system and software quality assurance best practices and methodologies
Demonstrates strong and effective verbal and written communication skills
Flexible and adaptable in regard to learning and understanding new technologies
Excellent leadership and project delivery skills
Excellent written and oral communication skills
Excellent interpersonal skills
Proven problem-solving, analytical and investigative skills
Ability to conduct research into software-related issues and products
Highly self-motivated and directed by being a great team player 
Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment
4-year degree BS/BA in a technical, business, or other analytical field required#LI-NT1
